Flares.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Fire_Ball.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: You have been Immobilized by a Ring of Fire. It is burning you for Minor fire Damage Over Time.
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: You have been Immobilized by a Ring of Fire. It is burning you for Minor fire Damage Over Time.

Char.display_help: You have been Incapacitated by the soot and cinders from the Char spell.
Char.display_target_help: You have been Incapacitated by the soot and cinders from the Char spell.

Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.
Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_target_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Mental_Blast.display_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your reflexes. Your attack speed is reduced.
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your reflexes. Your attack speed is reduced.

Mesmerize.display_help: You have been put to Sleep. You are helpless until the effect is broken.
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been put to Sleep. You are helpless until the effect is broken.

Dominate.display_help: Your mind has been Dominated. You are Held.
Dominate.display_target_help: Your mind has been Dominated. You are Held.

Resistance.display_help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic
Resistance.display_target_help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic

Mind_Stab.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mind_Stab.display_target_help: The Mind Stab has slowed your Attack rate.

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Flurry.display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of punches to pummel your foe. Flurry is so dizzying that it has a chance to Disorient the target.

Boxing.display_help: A decent punch that has a small chance to Disorient foes.

Kick.display_help: A modest kicking attack that has a small chance to knock opponents down.

Whirlwind.display_help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.

Speed_Boost.display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Speed_Boost.display_target_help: You've been granted a Speed Boost. Your Attack speed, Endurance recovery and Running speed are all increased and you are resistant to Slow effects.

Fulcrum_Shift.display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Target_Pistol.display_help: This invention can cause a target to feel tired and worn down, reducing the speed of their attacks. The Lethargy Inducer has 20 charges.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Quick Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Tranq_Dart.display_help: This invention can cause a target to feel tired and worn down, reducing the speed of their attacks. The Lethargy Inducer has 20 charges.
Tranq_Dart.display_target_help: You feel Lethargic and slow. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: Hypnotizes a group of foes at a distance and puts them to Sleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. This power deals no damage, but if done discreetly, the targets will never be aware of your presence. Recharge: Slow
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: You have been Hypnotized and cannot act.

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dark_Embrace.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast
Dark_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from lethal, smashing, and negative energy..

Death_Shroud.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Death Shroud.

Murky_Cloud.display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
Murky_Cloud.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)
Murky_Cloud.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from fire, cold, energy and negative energy damage with your {PowerName}.

Obsidian_Shield.display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
Obsidian_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)
Obsidian_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from psionic damage, Sleep, Fear and Disorient with your {PowerName}.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Cloak_of_Darkness.display_help: A shroud of Netherworld darkness envelops you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Cloak of Darkness grants you a bonus to Defense to all attacks attacks and some protection from Immobilization. This Netherworld Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Cloak of Darkness has no movement penalty. Cloak of Darkness will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow

Cloak_of_Fear.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, at reduced Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Cloak_of_Fear.display_target_help: The Cloak of Fear has terrified you.

Oppressive_Gloom.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

Soul_Transfer.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Cobra_Strike.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Focus_Chi.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals minor smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

Torrent.display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Torrent.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Torrent.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: You are being held by the Petrifying Gaze.
Petrifying_Gaze.display_attacker_hit: Your {Powername} Immobilizes {PlayerDest} and reduces his defense.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. You must be level 44 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. You must be level 47 and have two other Darkness Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Tenebrous_Tentacles.display_target_help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you in place and reducing your Accuracy.

Super_Leap.display_help: Ravenstorm can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.

Heavy_Sonic_Blast.display_help: The Heavy Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.
Heavy_Sonic_Blast.display_target_help: The Heavy Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.

Sonic_Blast.display_help: The Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.
Sonic_Blast.display_target_help: The Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.

Jab.display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.
Jab.display_target_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Punch.display_target_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Haymaker.display_target_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.
Hand_Clap.display_target_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

Knockout_Blow.display_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.
Knockout_Blow.display_target_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.display_target_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Thunderous_Blast.display_help: Statesman's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.
Thunderous_Blast.display_target_help: Statesman's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Temp_Invulnerability.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Dull_Pain.display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_target_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient effects, and all damage except Psionics, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, All DMG but Psionics), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient effects, and all damage except Psionics, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
Unyielding.display_target_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, All DMG but Psionics), Self -DEF
Unyielding.display_attacker_hit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but cannot move.

Invincibility.display_help: While this power is active, for each foe in melee range you receive a bonus to Defense against all melee attacks, some Defense to Ranged attacks, and a bonus to your Accuracy. This power is most effective while fighting multiple opponents. Invincibility is ineffective if you are battling foes at a range. Recharge: Slow

Unstoppable.display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Unstoppable.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Unstoppable.display_target_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

Cybernetic_Blade.display_help: A Cybernetic Blade is a powerful lethal attack
Cybernetic_Blade.display_target_help: A Cybernetic Blade is a powerful lethal attack

Blast.display_help: The Zenith Mech's Blast sends a focused beam of energy that can knock foes back.
Blast.display_target_help: The Zenith Mech's Blast sends a focused beam of energy that can knock foes back.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.
Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_target_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

O2_Boost.display_help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing his wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
O2_Boost.display_target_help: The O2 Boost has improved your resistance to Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects.

Snow_Storm.display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.display_target_help: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm.
Snow_Storm.display_attacker_hit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Short_Circuit.display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.display_target_help: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the Accuracy of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Freeze_Ray.display_help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding him helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

Ice_Storm.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Rain.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Bitter Freeze Ray deals medium damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Bitter Freeze Ray.

Blizzard.display_help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their Accuracy and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -ACC, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery
Blizzard.display_target_help: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, Accuracy and Movement speed are reduced.

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire. Deals some damage over time. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Medium
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and holding you motionless.

Fire_Sword.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a sword of fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Combustion.display_target_help: You have spontaneously combusted! You are burning!

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases Accuracy. Recharge: Long

Consume.display_help: You can Consume some fuel from your nearby enemies to recover Endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Burn.display_help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Burn.display_target_help: You are caught in a roaring fire and burning!

Ethereal.display_help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot be affected by those in normal space.

Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Quick Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Stunning_Shot.display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

Darkest_Night.display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and Accuracy of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Slow
Darkest_Night.display_target_help: Your Accuracy and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.

Shadow_Fall.display_help: Envelops you and your nearby teammates in a shroud of darkness. Shadow Fall does not grant Invisibility, but it does make you harder to detect. Even if you are discovered, Shadow Fall grants a bonus to Defense and Resistance to Fear, while reducing Energy, Negative Energy, and Psionic Damage. Shadow Fall reduces your movement speed, but not your allies'. Recharge: Slow
Shadow_Fall.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Energy, Negative, Psionics, Fear)
Shadow_Fall.display_target_help: Shadow Fall has made you difficult to detect, which increases your Defense. Shadowfall also partially absorbs and deflects Energy, Negative Energy and Psionic damage. You are also less fearful.
Shadow_Fall.display_victim_hit: You are hidden within the Shadow Fall.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Lift.display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Gravity_Distortion.display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

Propel.display_help: You can open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object, then Propel it at your foes for Smashing Damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
